Words not in official answer list



Number of Pangrams: 1

Maximum Puzzle Score: 110

Number of Answers: 25

Points Needed for Genius: 77

Genius requires between 11 and 22 words. You need at least a 8-letter word to reach genius. If you don't get the pangram, you need 83% of the total points to reach genius. If you get the pangram, you only need 65% of the remaining points to reach genius.

Other days with this pangram:

  • July 10, 2019 (Center Letter: P)
  • December 21, 2018 (Center Letter: N)



    • How does this puzzle compare to other puzzles?

    Today's score of 110 was the in the 30th percentile of all puzzles.
    The last time there was a score this low was on April 23, 2020.
    The highest score ever was 444 on April 6, 2019.
    The lowest score ever was 50 on May 17, 2019.

    This puzzle's 25 possible answers rank it in the 19th percentile of all puzzles.
    The last time there were fewer answers than this was on April 23, 2020.
    The highest number of answers was 81 on June 8, 2019.
    The lowest number of answers was 21 on August 5, 2018.

    It takes a 8-letter word for genius. This is pretty common.
